meanings.sent1: She fastens the button on her coat.
meanings.sent2: He always fastens his seatbelt before driving.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel fastens the acorn to the tree with care.
meanings.sent4: His smile fastens the attention of everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The glue fastens the pieces together like magic.

meanings.definition: To make something secure or tight
meanings.sent1: Dad fastens the lid tightly on the jar.
meanings.sent2: The rope fastens the boat to the dock.
meanings.sent3: The chef fastens the apron snugly around his waist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination fastens her resolve to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The lock fastens the door securely against intruders.

meanings.definition: To close or secure with a fastener
meanings.sent1: She fastens the clasp on her necklace.
meanings.sent2: He fastens the latch on the gate.
meanings.sent3: The child fastens the Velcro on his shoes with glee.
meanings.sent4: The contract fastens the agreement between the parties.
meanings.sent5: The zipper fastens the jacket to keep out the cold.
